mbean.description: ThreadPoolMBean manages the Resin-wide thread pool.

attribute.name: ThreadMax
attribute.description: The configured maximum number of allowed threads.

attribute.name: SpareThreadMin
attribute.description: The configured minimum number of idle threads.

attribute.name: ThreadCount
attribute.description: The current total number of threads managed by the pool.

attribute.name: ActiveThreadCount
attribute.description: The number of threads currently running a ThreadTask.

attribute.name: IdleThreadCount
attribute.description: The number of idle threads waiting for a ThreadTask.

notification.name: com.caucho.server.resin.ThreadPool.max
notification.description: Notification sent when the maximum number of threads is hit.
